about: Graduated in the Computer Engineering course, enthusiast for various technologies, I am always looking for ways to improve myself in my area of ​​expertise. I'm open to opportunities that motivate me and solidify my experience as a developer and computer engineer

profissional_exp.comment: Primarily working with Kotlin, Spring Boot, and messaging services like Kafka and RabbitMQ. I internally develop code, efficiently configuring queues for consumers and producers. I use tools like New Relic to optimize system performance

I worked with Java 11 and Spring Boot on the Microsoft Azure cloud platform. My skills include using Terraform for implementation and maintenance. I utilize tools such as New Relic for observability. I develop systems following SOLID principles and apply TDD and BDD to encompass the testing pyramid.
I manage the entire infrastructure, providing APIs for school management. I work with Java 8, MySQL, and AWS services, including Lambda, SQS, SNS, S3, Aurora, and API Gateway.

Developer in the company's R&D area, performing and testing and improving the software that manages the product's hardware, using the Java 8 programming language, embedded in Intel Edison microcontrollers.
